text: Ana ngankuiona yanti Allah akwinjisyaga chilo m’muusi (ni kuleupa muusi kwipipa chilo mpela ndaŵi jachitukuta), ni akwinjisyaga soni muusi nchilo (ni kuleupa chilo kwipipa muusi mpela ndaŵi jakusisima), ni alijepepesye lyuŵa ni mwesi chilichose chikwenda kwandaŵi jekolanjidwe, nambo soni yanti Allah abali syosope sya yankutenda aŵele Jwasimanya chenene
